```{r setup, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(viridisLite)
library(cowplot)
```

#Looks like JALD2 got knocked out by ice 
#JALD1+KALD1+KALD2 got stuck in the ice or there was basically no current in those lagoons

```{r look_at_data, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source('scr/TCMdata_import.R')

ggplot(TCM_Temp, aes(DT, Temperature))+
  geom_line(aes(color=Station))+
  theme_cowplot()

ggplot(TCM_Curr, aes(DT, Speed_cm_s))+
  geom_line(aes(color=Station))+
  facet_wrap(~Station, scales="free")+
  theme_cowplot()
```

#Datecut JALD2

```{r JALD2}

TCM_Temp %>% filter(Station=="JALD2") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(DT, Temperature))+
  geom_line(aes(color=Station))+
  theme_cowplot()

TCM_Curr %>% filter(Station=="JALD2") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(DT, Speed_cm_s))+
  geom_line(aes(color=Station))+
  facet_wrap(~Station, scales="free")+
  theme_cowplot()
```
